q: While there is no official word yet on whether he'll run for Indiana governor, many in political circles assumed that would be the case since he stepped down last year from his House leadership position. I am convinced he is now going to run for governor, said Mike McDaniel , a former state Republican chairman. The 51-year-old Mr. Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as "a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican

What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.
